participant_1.background:
I secretly want to be a professional athlete, but I know my parents would never approve.
i am the leader of the french fry research department at del taco.
i have the gene that lets me know when someones eaten asparagus.
I juggle for a living in a circus, and I come from a small town in the Midwest.
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.

participant_2.background:
I'm majoring in business and love to lamp, but the hardest thing I've ever done was trying to explain this to my parents.
I enjoy cooking for my beloved cat and dog.
i want to visit rome , but i cannot make myself go alone.
i am a vet tech.
I'm single, but my writing keeps me busy.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you. How about you?

Doing well, thanks for asking. I am a juggler, and I come from a small town in the Midwest. I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals. What do you do for a living?

I am a vet tech, and I enjoy cooking for my beloved cat and dog. I am also a writer, and I am single, but my writing keeps me busy. I am looking forward to visiting Rome someday, but I cannot make myself go alone. What are your hobbies?

I love to juggle for a living in a circus, and I secretly want to be a professional athlete, but I know my parents would never approve. I have the gene that lets me know when someone has eaten asparagus. I am a leader in the french fry research department at del taco, and I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
Wow, that's so interesting! I have never met a juggler before. What's it like to be a juggler?
It's a lot of fun! I love being able to entertain people with my juggling skills
